name: RPPreviewViewControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol you implement to respond to changes to a screen-recording user interface.

items.name: func previewControllerDidFinish(RPPreviewViewController)
items.desc: Indicates that the preview view controller is ready to be dismissed.

items.name: func previewController(RPPreviewViewController, didFinishWithActivityTypes: Set<String>)
items.desc: Indicates that the preview view controller is ready to be dismissed with associated activity types.
